name: The Trader Management Company
description: Bespoke Forex Live Trading Room provider
overview: The Trader Management Company delivers professional trade insights through a bespoke Live Trading Room platform. Comprising a team of experienced day traders, TMC has developed its platform with accessibility and ease of use in mind. By combining text, audio, and charting functionality, platform users benefit from realtime market commentary and trade education. Indeed, with education the ultimate goal of the TMC offering, TMC’s traders use the platform to demonstrate how and why trade signals are raised. At the same time TMC’s traders provide the necessary trade information to enable users to place their own informed trades.
